content: The final PR for replacing Complex.abs by norm is ready for review.

(Maybe different clients are different, but in the web Zulip interface, this icon here is the PR link:

image.png

I think it shows one such icon per # link that appears.)
Adding the number also means the bot can react with PR progress.
(@Damiano Testa Could the pr/issue emoji bot also add emojis to the first message in a topic whose name contains a pr/issue number?)
I think that it might, but I need to look into what the Zulip API gives you in terms of scanning threads. #22031
Note that the explicit link is also useful on mobile: on Android, at least, there is no direct way to go to the PR from the subject of the thread.
